basics.name: Miki Kojima
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Engineering with a minor in Mathematics at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall of 2024.

highlights: Prepare solutions to calculus IV homework sets
Examine, correct, and promptly grade students’ assignments by a deadline
Wrote unit tests to improve test coverage of Aolytix, a cloud infrastructure visualization tool
Developed an AWS simulator for developers on the Aolytix team for scaling and performance testing
Examined, corrected, and provided feedback to students’ midterm and final exams within a week
Provided academic assistance to students in need
Guided students with homework and test preparation

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii, College of Engineering
awards.summary: Recognition for students who earn a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade and do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester

awards.title: Mānoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship for first-time, degree-seeking students with a GPS 3.8 or higher

awards.title: Hawaii Seal of Biliteracy in Japanese and English
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
